Note to self, hit this minor bug on shutdown:
```
2019-05-14 14:43:00,808 ERROR BLACS.NI_USB_6229_0_acquisition_worker.worker: Exception in job:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "C:\labscript_suite\labscript_devices\NI_DAQmx\blacs_workers.py", line 439, in shutdown
    self.stop_task()
  File "C:\labscript_suite\labscript_devices\NI_DAQmx\blacs_workers.py", line 520, in stop_task
    if len(self.buffered_chans) and self.task is None:
TypeError: object of type 'NoneType' has no len()
